ygData.subject: Leatherfoot Raider's Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes but I am told that when you turn in the four skins you get the old cap which he calls the petitioner s cap.  At that time you are given the quest for the
ygData.messageBody:
Yes but I am told that when you turn in the four skins you get the old cap
which he calls the petitioner's cap. At that time you are given the quest
for the 'real' Leatherfoot Raider's cap, which does require the dirk.

-----Original Message-----
From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 10:42 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4
[g4mntofcr@... Y.MIL]
Importance: Low


From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>

The dirk isn't used in this particular quest anymore, IIRC. In fact, I
think it now requires 4 skins of various animals around Norrath.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard (Povar)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 2:40 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4
> [g4mntofcr@...]
>
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> I plan on trying the new Halfling only 'Super' Leatherfoot
> Raider cap. I
> can easily obtain one for the cost of a dirk (25-40pp) and I bet some
> halfling down there would make the trade.
>
> Dean
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 1:44 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Travelling to Lower Guk to get a Guise
>
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Well I tried to get a Guise this past weekend but was
> unsuccessful. When I
> got to Lower Guk there was a party camping the assasin room
> and several
> people in the group didn't have a Guise yet and were
> unwilling to let me
> purchase looting rights. They even laughed when I offered to
> give PP for
> it. At their level PP was worthless. One of them told me he
> would have
> considered letting me loot the Guise if I had something of
> value to trade
> him. The problem with this is that there aren't too many
> items a 25th level
> player can obtain that a 35+ level player doesn't already
> have. Guess I
> will just have to wait until I'm in my 30s and get one for myself.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
>
>
>
>
> > Thats a good idea. I'm certain that with
> either my charm or
> > my cash,
> > someone will let me loot the Guise. My main
> concern though
> > is not getting
> > killed while I'm down there. Any suggestions
> on how a 24
> > bard can pull this
> > off?
> >
> > Galtin of E'ci
> >
> > > Step number one, if you get down there and a group is
> > camping the mob that
> > > drops the guise
> > > (Assassin? I don't remember) is to just ask
> if they would
> > mind if you
> > > looted it. Be creative,
> > > offer to sing them a song or something in
> exchange for it.
> > >
> > > Chances are, they're nice people who all have
> masks anyway
> > and just want
> > > to pull Serrated Bone
> > > Dirks and they'll happily let you loot the mask if you
> > entertain them.
> >
> >
> >
>
